src:
Chelsea Ramaikan Perburuan Timo Werner
05 Nov 2019, 17:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Daftar peminat striker RB Leipzig, Timo Werner semakin panjang. Chelsea menyusul Liverpool dan Manchester United untuk perburuan sang striker.
Dua musim terakhir, karir Werner tengah mengalami peningkatan yang signifikan. Ia berhasil menjadi pesaing yang berat bagi Robert Lewandowski untuk memperebutkan trofi sepatu emas Bundesliga.
Berkat ketajamannya itu, ada banyak klub yang tertarik untuk merekrutnya. Manchester United dan Liverpool berencana saling sikut untuk mengamankan jasa sang striker.
Express melansir bahwa ada pesaing baru untuk perebutan tanda tangan Werner. Klub asal Chelsea, Timo Werner diberitakan juga tertarik untuk merekrut sang striker.

Simak rencana transfer Chelsea untuk Werner selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Chelsea enliven Timo Werner's Hunting
05 Nov 2019, 17:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The list of interested RB Leipzig strikers, Timo Werner is getting longer. Chelsea overtook Liverpool and Manchester United to hunt down the striker.
The last two seasons, Werner's career has experienced a significant increase. He managed to become a tough competitor for Robert Lewandowski for the Bundesliga gold shoe trophy.
Thanks to his sharpness, there are many clubs who are interested in recruiting him. Manchester United and Liverpool plan to elbow each other to secure the services of the striker.
Express reported that there were new competitors for the struggle for Werner's signature. Chelsea club Timo Werner is reportedly also interested in recruiting the striker.

Check out Chelsea's full transfer plan for Werner below.
